verses.roman:
"āmāra ājñāya, raghunātha, yāha vṛndāvane
tāhāṅ yāñā raha rūpa-sanātana-sthāne

synonyms: āmāra ājñāya—upon My order; raghunātha—My dear Raghunātha; yāha vṛndāvane—go to Vṛndāvana; tāhāṅ yāñā—going there; raha—remain; rūpa-sanātana-sthāne—in the care of Rūpa Gosvāmī and Sanātana Gosvāmī.
translation: "My dear Raghunātha, go to Vṛndāvana, following My instructions, and place yourself under the care of Rūpa and Sanātana Gosvāmīs.
